table.name: driver_calendar
table.description: This table captures the Driver work profile definition, that includes the Activity calendar and the Home location.

columns.name: HOME_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The home location of the driver defined for this work profile.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_CALENDAR_GID
columns.description: The activity calendar of the driver defined for this work profile.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date for this driver work profile.

columns.name: EXPIRY_DATE
columns.description: The expiry date for this driver work profile.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: IS_SHIFT_BASED
columns.description: Allows you to select whether the work profile for the driver is Shift Based or not. If you set this to Yes, then the work profile is evaluated when you try and get the driver home. The driver will be sent home at the end of each shift, and they will start from their home location for their next assignment.
